body: I see alot of threads that have been locked and I have one of my discussions locked but I dont get what it means, if there is one is it like the thread has no meaning or its bad someone explain it to me please
body_tagged: I see alot of threads that have been locked and I have one of my discussions locked but I dont get what it means, if there is one is it like the thread has no meaning or its bad someone explain it to me please
title: What does having your thread locked mean

replies.body: means u cant edit it no more cuz of rule breaking or somthin
replies.body_tagged: means u cant edit it no more cuz of rule breaking or somthin

replies.body: Mostly, it means that topic was not needed anymore. Sometimes it starts in flamewars, sometimes it's spamming, etc.
replies.body_tagged: Mostly, it means that topic was not needed anymore. Sometimes it starts in flamewars, sometimes it's spamming, etc.

replies.body: If a topic was bumped, turned into a flame war, or is a duplicate of another post, it can be locked.
replies.body_tagged: If a topic was bumped, turned into a flame war, or is a duplicate of another post, it can be locked.

replies.body: u used to be able to request locks, but not since the update...
replies.body_tagged: u used to be able to request locks, but not since the update...
